page.title: 05Vandalism in Kirkcaldy
page.content: Our local councillor said that proper education could solve this problem and that the court should decide what to do about what vandals have done.He thinks parents should pay for the damage that their child has done.They should also warn their children not to spray paint on walls or to break windows.In the town most damage is done by spray paint rather than breaking glass or pulling down fences. The most popular things that are written are people's names and the names of pop groups or gangs.People think that vandalism is getting worse so the council have formed a new group of council workers who are provided with vans.Their job is to stamp out vandalism by patrolling the streets where problems are likely to occur.
